mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_address(id, login_id, street_address, detail_address, latitude, longitude, created_at, modified_at, created_by, modified_by) VALUES (UNHEX(REPLACE(UUID(), '-', '')), #{loginId}, #{streetAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{createdAt}, #{modifiedAt}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedBy})
mapper.select: SELECT hex(SUBSTR(id, 1, 16)) AS id, login_id, street_address, detail_address, latitude, longitude FROM user_address WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
